name: Shawanna Grant
text: Wondering couple and great customer service skills and I feel In love with the banner

name: Jared Garfield
text: Michael Godwin is a true Southern gentleman, who goes above and beyond to meet client expectations.  When I first walked into his store he stayed way after hours to meet my needs.  His recommendations were excellent and innovative, especially his "window perf sign process" that will give me one of the best storefronts in the Historic Prattville downtown.  His prices are excellent, and he was even willing to match national pricing from a big warehouse vendor for my real estate signs!  If you want small town service, big city professionalism and great pricing, Central Alabama Sign & Banner is your place.

name: Kimberly Cole Zemke
text: He has been our sign man for years!  He does superior work!!  Great prices and fast service!! He is very creative and stays  on the cusp of new technologies!  Give Michael a try and you will be very satisfied with his work.

resp.text: Thank You

name: Evita B
text:
Went in to get an outdoor retail sign. Gave my information and was told someone would come out and measure. They never did. I called about 3 weeks later and was told someone would come out that day to measure. Waited at the location all day until about 8pm. No one showed up. I've heard a similar story from another business owner about them never showing up or calling back. Decided to go with SignOps and they were very helpful, and got our sign made and up within a week of contacting them and approving the design. They handled everything and it looks perfect!

Response. "Perceived"? No one came to measure and he admitted he didn't come and measure the first time, citing the holidays. I visited the shop before the holidays and in 3 weeks time, no one measured or contacted me. After I called, he never came that day after saying he would. I was there all day, and no one measured and no one contacted me. I do not have any calls from this place and I gave my cellphone number and address. Place is like 10 to 15 minutes away. As I said, another business has had the same experience. People reading this review can decide for themselves from my "perceived" experience. Thank you and have a nice day.

resp.text: I am very sorry for your perceived experience.  One of our salesmen did go out and measure for your sign. After repeated attempts to contact you with no response on your part, we figured you decided to go another route.  If there is anything we can do for you in the future, please do not hesitate to contact us.

name: Tiffany Trueblood-Adkins
text: These folks are great to work with! They do a superb job and always help when I'm in rush for time!

name: Alisa B
text: This family owned/run business is awesome.  Always friendly, great customer service.  I have purchased several monogrammed products from Central Alabama Sign and every single one was perfect!

name: Janyth Grimes
text: Would not exchange return damaged merchandise.

resp.text: I'm sorry that we would not be able to return your item.   There was no receipt for return and the item did not leave our store in the condition that you attempted to return it in (Stained with black marks and cut under the arm).  We inspect our clothing items carefully and do not sell unacceptable product.

name: Pamela H
text: What an amazing job that was done. Just a quick phone call, and she had the perfect t-shirt designed. Excellent work. Will def be back. Thanks!

name: SEAN B

name: Adam Crocker
text: Had a great experience. Took a touch longer than i really wanted to get my shirts made, though that's partially my fault. Extremely happy with how they have turned out! Reasonable pricing and quality products with friendly employees. You rock Andrew👍

name: Minnie Raven
text: Very awesome staff and great customer service in record time. Will recommend to anyone and also will be coming back for more business! 👍

text: Andrew Grundy with Logo Express has been a great customer of mine at Cartridge World Vestavia. They did a great job with our new ball caps and car magnets. Couldn't be happier with the product, service and expertise. Forget those online logo companies and stay local with Logo Express!

text: Logo Express do great work at affordable prices. They have produced embroidered and printed shirts for us and we've been happy every time.

name: Jonatha Temple
text:
Logo Express  offers a variety of  customizable monogrammed items, like uniform shirts, hats, handbags and more!   Logo Express is the absolute best monogram and uniform company I have ever used ! Shan and his staff are always kind, professional, and caring.

I have used Logo Express for several years and have NEVER been disappointed. I have three different companies that I get shirts for. I purchase Uniform shirts, tee shirts, hats and more. Shan helps me with getting my logo digitized and will provide a sample of the logo on fabric so I can see what it looks like.

Shan and I have worked together for so long that all I have to do is text him and he gets my order ready, Like I said previously, I have never been disappointed with Logo Express and I can say with confidence that if you use Logo Express you will not be disappointed either! Great Company!

text: Terrible!!! DO NOT USE THEM! This guy ruined my husbands business shirts and then was so ugly when I asked him if he would redo them or fix them in some way. Threatened to call the police and then asked me to leave his shop!

resp.text: As a small business owner of LogoExpress, I take full responsibility of this unfortunate experience of a very challenging customer and regret at full extent. We have been serving greater Birmingham area with our services for the past 24 years with word of mouth recommendations only, we take pride in what we do and will continue to feel good of our purpose by doing the right thing.

name: Jordan Lovell
text:
Really disappointed in Athens Athletics this year.  They shorted me one Jersey and two hats for youth baseball.  They told me the items would here by opening day.  Long story short, they weren't.  Nobody called, nobody apologized, no explanations were given....  I was told they had ordered me a shirt, but they no longer had the size I needed, so they ordered a different size.  Also, eventually, they told me the hats had never been ordered.

I came today and they refunded me my money that I paid them 2-3 weeks ago.  I still don't have the hats and shirts for everyone :(

resp.text: I apologize that you were not called or apologized too. These hats and jerseys are trademarked and we can’t produce them ourselves because of MLB. When the company is out of stock and tells me they can’t give me a date of when they will be there I chose to get the next size so you would have something for opening day. The hats were ordered originally and shorted from the order so they were reordered. It is not our intention at all for you not to get what you order. If I could print them myself this would not be an issue. Again I apologize for this happening!

I called muscle shoals florist and Stacy not only got it delivered  , but also bent over backwards to make sure we were satisfied with our order . So thank you Stacy 💖 little Wyatt is happy  , my husband and I are happy  , and big Wyatt is happy and felling very special for his birthday.

I called, not to complain, just to let someone know how reckless he was and the rude woman that answered the phone responded with "it's Valentine's day and he is in a hurry". Hope they treat their customers with more courtesy than that.

text:
Would not recommend to anyone!!! Save your money and go anywhere else . From the treatment I received by the Owner Mrs Renfro to the embarrassing arrangement that was received.
When you are asked to pay for something you expect to get what you paid for. When I called back to question the arrangement she was so rude and did not care that we were not happy.

So unprofessional and such a BAD experience.

name: Chryl Yarbrough
text: Nice people, great flowers and gifts.

name: James Ball
text: Very helpful and I've always been satisfied with the flowers

name: Ken
text: This is the best place to order flowers in the area, they always make wonderful arrangements even when they don't have a lot of notice.

name: Carrol Steakley
text:
I rarely order flowers and I am not happy with the whole teleflora website/florist experience. I feel that I should be able to pick out  a picture of the flowers and container that I would like to purchase, pay for it, and have it delivered. When I order an item, let's say a new chair,  I can see a photo of the  chair and know what I am paying for ,and when it arrives it should be the chair I ordered. I don't like paying for something that is NOT what I ordered. While I understand fresh flowers may need to be substituted the arrangement should resemble the photo. Flowers should be similar and the container should be exact.  A container should not be in a photo on the website if it is not " in stock". This is false advertising. Each individual florist probably doesn't have what is pictured on the Teleflora websites.
I called the florist and expressed my concern and followed up with an email with pictures of what I ordered and what was delivered.  I ordered a beautiful sturdy white wicker basket with flowers and what I got was a cheap multicolored Easter egg basket. They substituted the basket and after I complained they were willing to offer me a credit of $2.50. What a joke!  I will not use this florist in the future for any reason and will never use a site that is managed by Teleflora. My thoughts are that the Teleflora company has way too many florist and they do not know what each flower shop has in stock. So when you order from a site like this one, you NEVER KNOW WHAT YOU ARE GOING TO GET. BEWARE. I wish I could put a photo on this commentary. I paid $45.73 for something that was NOT what I ordered.  Here is the response from the florist:

Thank you for your recent order. We pride ourselves on delivering the best, most fresh and most similar arrangements that we can for our customers and we have been doing so for over 38 year in the Shoals area! I am very glad you were pleased with the flowers that we provided for you and your mother.

In response to your recent request for a 50% refund here is our answer:
The basket chosen was unavailable and a similar value was substitute per our substitution policy.
We were also instructed to call and leave on the front porch if no one was available. Which we did. Our standard policy is to call and if there is no response, and no one is home, we leave a message as to where the flowers are. Since we were instructed, by you, to leave them, they were; only after a phone call was made. Had you not told us to leave the arrangement, and weather was not good for our arrangement, we would have left a message detailing where the arrangement could be picked up.
Also, you did not order from a 3rd party person. You placed your order on our website, which is managed and updated by Teleflora. They are our wire service and website managing team. They have thousands of florists that they service and we all obviously have different items in stock. They do a generic picture, and when a picture is chosen we try to fill the order as best we can with the flowers we have on hand at that particular time. Flowers are very seasonal and have a high turnover because of spoilage. Next time, a  call directly to the florist could save you a substitution since you would know immediately what they had available at that time.

As far as using another florist, they would offer the same substitution policy as us, so I don't know that you would've been happier.

Since you were happy with the flowers provided in the arrangement and they were Pretty and Fresh I can NOT offer you a 1/2 refund of the product, being as though you were please with it. I will however refund you the "basket" charge since you were not pleased with the substitution chosen. I will be adding a refund of the Full container charge of $2.50 to your card. I hope this helps.
Thank you for your business.

name: Muscle Shoals Florist

text: Great little shop for specialty clothing and very nice staff as well !

name: Rickey Moran
text: Great service and is awesome place to shop.

name: Chris Jordan
text: Everything you want a hometown sports store be.

name: Jason Norris
text: Great local store with awesome customer service.

name: Janet Sanders
text: I love the entire staff. Everyone has always been so helpful. Even when I am unsure of what to order for my business they always seem to know exactly what I need. I will always be a repeat customer.

name: William Burkett
text: Always a great experience!

name: Glenn Koehler
text: I'm so glad you guys are back and going strong, the city missed you! As the buzz continued around the city from church to school and even in local stores once you guys opened back up the buzz really began to sing, Friendly, local home feel and always willing to help in anyway they can, prices are reasonable and worth every penny!

name: Robert Mashburn
text: Great hometown sporting goods store. Friendliest service you could ever hope for.

name: K
text: Great family owned store. We got everything we needed for the softball season.

name: Scott Holmes
text: Great place,  great service.  It's not big but stop here first!

name: Renee Brown
text: Great staff love them 🎉

name: Jerry Oddo
text: Very helpful and pleasant staff

name: Christopher Smith
text: Awesome staff

name: Tint Pro
text: High quality products at a great price, locally owned and everything is done in house. You can't ask for anything more! I highly recommend!

resp.text: Much appreciated Matt. We look forward to a long relationship with TINTpro!

name: Hannah Coulter
text: Joe, Shawn, and the team at Regalo have been great to work. They are true professionals and know how to take care of their customers. They always go above and beyond to provide the best product with a high level of customer service. Highly recommend them!

resp.text: Thank you Hannah

name: Kelsi Nuss
text: Mr. Lubisco and his staff have done countless corporate orders for me and they are always friendly, service is prompt, and they make sure our order is exactly what we need! There have been a few times that I’ve needed rush orders and I don’t know what I would’ve done without their help! We also set up a t-shirt fundraiser through entrusted tees and they made the whole process super simple. Great customer service! Thanks guys!

resp.text: Thank you

name: Beth Tutwiler-McGuire
text: The Morgan County Association of REALTORS® really enjoys working with Entrusted Tees. The staff is helpful and very knowledgeable. They have done things for our office, as well as individual REALTORS® and our Affiliate Council. Their items (shirts, banners, signs, buttons) and work are of high quality, professionally designed and they offer outstanding prices for all of our needs and get the work done in a timely manner. I would highly recommend them!

name: Michael Hamilton
text: They are located in upperriver road and the staff are friendly and they are reasonable prices.

name: Robert Martin
text: The team at Entrusted Tees is top notch! They always go above and beyond to put your business goals first. They do amazing corporate apperal, shirts, hat and just about anything else you could put your logo on. Thanks for being amazing :)

name: unknown being
text:
Joe, Bill, and the rest of them team are always professional and helpful. Great graphics design and quality products. Thank you
Pete Willis
IMS, Inc.

name: Shorty Pilk Ranch
text: The staff at Entrusted Tees makes it easy for me to stay up to date with advertising and uniforms for my crews and so much more. They are reliable, friendly and quick to get what I need in a timely fashion. Banners, polo shirts, hats, t-shirts, vinyl and more no job has been too big or small.

name: Karen Woldahl
text: Fast, easy service with a smile.  We use them for way more than just shirts....all our printing needs   Quick turnaround, vast item selection and friendly staff.  They are a great community partner to have.

name: Leigh Littrell
text: Loved the ability to design a shirt online through the website and the screen printing turned out beautiful! The quality was top notch and so was the customer service! I will definitely use Entrusted Tees in the future!

name: Pamela Phillips
text: Alot of help and very sweet person that helped us ......Excited about getting them.....Thx for everything

name: Chad Johnson
text: I get all my business attire here ,great business.

name: Alba Theriot
text: Great Service, awesome staff. Highly recommend.

name: Shane Taylor
text:
Exceptional Service ! Great staff , always a pleasure dealing with them.
Highly recommend using them!

name: Gaming Dude
text: Great products and people!!

name: Tiffany Hardwick Watson
text: Quality products and excellent customer service from genuine people - That's what you get at Entrusted Tees!

name: Todd Beam
text: The staff was so help and knew exactly what I wanted

name: Nathan Burrows
text: Great products and service!

name: Lisa Moore
text: Seems very dependable

name: Michael Kidwell
text: Playmaker did an excellent job on my companies screenprinted T shirts and on our embroidered button downs. The design process was quick and easy and Ben and his staff were friendly and very easy to work with. I highly recommend them

name: The Real Mortimers
text:
This company is fabulous! We had an idea and they executed it perfectly. Such great products and the staff went above and beyond with their service. They contacted us throughout the entire process to make sure that everything was correct and if we were happy with their services. On top of all the above their prices simply couldn’t be beat.
I am very thankful for the friend that suggested for me to use them. I thought it was going to be such a hassle and it was the complete opposite. Thanks again Playmaker’s for all your help.

resp.text: Our team here at Playmaker is thrilled to hear such amazing feedback! Thanks, Gina!

name: Christy Keyton
text: I have worked with this company for years.  When I want something custom, they always listen and help me find just what I want.  They know their stuff!  Very courteous and professional.  And they deliver the product quickly.  Can’t speak highly enough of this company!

resp.text: Thank you for the great feedback. We try really hard to provide a good experience at Playmaker here in Dothan and are really happy to hear that you have been pleased!

name: Rosana Burnett
text: Speedy service and great quality products. Our logo and t-shirts look amazing! Exactly how we wanted them! This company will go over and beyond to meet your needs.  Highly recommended, we will use them again.

resp.text: Thank you for the fantastic review, Rosana! Meeting our customers needs is always a goal, and hearing that we lived up to that goal is very encouraging!

name: Jessica Wells
text: Playmaker keeps Healthwest Dental stocked with our "patient favorite" mugs. Ben was very quick to get our logo into their system and produce high quality yet reasonably priced merchandise. We appreciate Ben and Playmakers dedication to their clients!!

resp.text: Thanks for placing your trust in us and your willingness to share.

name: Julie German
text: Playmaker has been very attentive and timely during all of our chaotic orders. They have been patient and available to assist us in our designing and ordering process.  Thank you all for all of your hard work. We will continue to use you and recommend your services!!

resp.text: Thanks, Julie! We really appreciate you as one of our customers and enjoy working with you!

name: J.D. and Jennifer Peaden
text: The Playmaker staff is very easy to work with, professional and delivers great quality of products. My large order was handled in a timely manner, and we were more than pleased with the results. Highly recommended!

resp.text: We are incredibly grateful that you took the time out to leave this fantastic review. Customer satisfaction is a top priority and it is customers like you that make our job wonderful! Thank you JD and Jennifer!

name: David Duke
text: Incredible customer service and great quality products. Cost has always been very reasonable and they go over and beyond to meet your needs. Extremely happy with all of our purchases for our small business as well as personally. Thank you, I will continue to do business with Playmaker Embroidery in the future.

resp.text: Thanks, David!

name: Harry Hall
text: Fantastic group that can get you anything to help your business or event look better. Very easy to deal with and quick turnaround time. Highly recommend!

resp.text: Thanks for the awesome review, Harry! We work hard to meet expectations like yours, and we’re happy to hear we hit the mark for you.

name: Tec Tony
text: Ben and his team really know what to to do whe it comes to screen printing and embroidery. Thank you so much.

resp.text: Your kind words are greatly appreciated, and we hope you won’t hesitate to let us know if we can help you in the future!

name: Krystal Davis
text: We needed shirts for K4 graduation. Ben, Jessie, and the team were able to work with us on the art and get our shirts to us quickly. The kids and parents loved their shirts and we loved working with the staff at Playmaker!

resp.text: Thank you for the kind review! And you are right, Jessie is an awesome graphic designer!

name: David Asbill
text: By far the best customer service and quality of any team wear in this area.  We have used Playmaker for years for our teams and custom apparel.  Very personable and professional!

resp.text: Thank you David, we appreciate you

name: Mural City Coffee Company
text: We've ordered shirts from Playmaker multiple times now, and they never disappoint. Everything that leaves their doors is high quality and done right!

resp.text: It’s great to hear that you’ve had five star experiences with us! Everyone at Playmaker appreciates your business and positive feedback!

name: Ken Cline
text: I am President of TCBC Development Co. We have been doing business with playmaker for a while now. Their work has been absolutely perfect. The are our go to company for screen print and Embroidery needs.

resp.text: Thanks you, Ken!

name: Jamey Green
text: Our experiences with this company have always been positive.  They are a great team to work with and are very friendly.

resp.text: Thank you so much for taking the time to share your amazing review with us and the community!

name: Marianne Fraedrich
text:
Rehobeth Pee Wee is a proud to partner up with Playmaker to help with providing great Rebel gear for the kids and parents!

Thank you for your help with all our design needs!

resp.text: Thank you Marianne, we love working with you.

name: Fun Zone Dothan
text: The Playmaker team goes above and beyond to make sure we are happy with our products and is always willing to help when we’re pinched for time. Great asset to our business.

resp.text: Thank you Jason, we love working with Fun Zone!

name: Christ is who We love
text: Placed a last-minute order with a Ben @ Playmaker and he and his staff completed the order so quickly. They have also printed CrossFit shirts for me in the past and they looked incredible!!

resp.text: Thanks for taking the time to share your feedback with us. It means so much when our best customers share their experiences.

name: Anthony Kenward
text: Great staff and always top quality work.

name: Fritz Dittus
text: Great company!! Awesome customer service.

resp.text: Thank you for the great review, Fritz! We look forward to working with you again!

name: Carrie McBride
text: Had stuff made for my business as well as personally. They are always very helpful, professional, and prompt!

resp.text: Carrie, thank you for the great review! We’re so happy you have loved your orders!

name: Joe Evans
text: Ben did a great job working with us, got our logo perfect, great job!

resp.text: Thanks, Joe!

name: Eddie White
text: Great place they do it your way

resp.text: Thank you!

name: Kristine Odom
text: Very Bad business person ,

resp.text: We do not recall doing business with you, but would love to make things right. Feel free to contact us at (334)673-0103

name: John Stallions
text: Great place for alterations and custom jobs.  They did an excellent job shortening  a martial arts belt me for a great price.

name: M C (Purple Seawitch)
text: Love Stitchez!! I get all my monogramming done here. Great gift ideas

resp.text: Thank you!

name: Kimberly “38 Hot” Gordon
text: I absolutely love this place....reasonably priced...great selection of items to choose from....great spirited place ...the staff is very very sweet and helpful...

resp.text: Thank you!

name: Jody W
text:
Great service and value
Friendly as well

resp.text: Thank you!!

name: Bobby Longway 256
text: They made a pair of $225 jeans fit like they should. Great work !

resp.text: Thank ypu!

name: Reginald Priest
text: Super nice people even under a lots of stress.

resp.text: Thank you!

name: Cathy Thigpen
text:
I just wanted to tell you about
This fabulous place called STITCHEZ. Ms Renee’, who owns the store is someone you will want to meet. She can do so many things. From sewing to alterations to monogram plus more.  She and her staff are so inviting and helpful and will make sure you are pleased with your items. This is the one place I can assure you you will love to visit. You won’t regret it!!!!

name: Tina Powell
text: Love this place ❤

resp.text: Thank you!

name: Feloney Mayes
text: I love this shop, the staff is welcoming and professional at all times. The merchandise you ordering is always completed in a timely manner.  Renee makes beautiful made to order personal pieces. You really need to check out this shop!

name: Kimberly Taylor
text: I was told a dress would be finished on a date as I needed it for a wedding. No one called me, yet when I went in to pick up the dress they claimed they did but had no proof and no one left a message and I did not have a voicemail proving they did. The owner was very rude to me and stated I should've called myself so it was basically my fault. Very unprofessional.

name: Amanda Ashcraft
text: Fantastic customer service and amazing work!

name: Imani Wade
text: Perfect I love it

name: Raegan McNeill
text: Always good service, nice people, and AMAZING work!!!!!

name: Vickie Griffin
text: This is a great place to do business with, the owner went above customer service to help me out on an order.

name: Jessica Rice
text: We love the bag I got stitched for my son !!!

name: David Elmore
text: They were very nice and was willing to stay late for us to pick up our order.

name: Holly Hargrove
text: Wonderful gift shop and great monogrammed shirts!!! One of my favorite places to shop in Athens!!!

name: Chelsea Greene
text: I love this place! I have been using them for years. They are affordable, have what I want, and turn around is never too long! Great customer service. I wouldn't expect anything else from them.

name: Paula King
text: They are great at helping you w whatever you need. I ordered shirts for them.

name: Nancy Steadmon
text: Jason and Holly have always been awesome.  Great service

name: Edie Hartley
text: Took some shirts in to get monogrammed for work. Staff was nice and helpful.

name: Kathy Najera
text: Wonderful people..

name: Mrs. DeAviance Fowlks-Turner
text: Awesome work! 💛💙

name: a h
text: As expected.

name: M BURGAMANN
text: This store received this 2 star VERY sparingly, it should have been a 1(Due to Cust. Service, & an impatient employee named Brent/Bret). Driving from ATL to pick up a hat or 2, or even 3 Right after I got off work, so I can wear my pride on my vacation next week I walked out emptyhanded. Lids your company did not get my business today & I clearly drove 100+ Miles to shop with you, due to your impatient employee I left the store.  have to do a better job,  this guy could NEVER Get a job with our organization, with this lack of customer service displayed. Very Disappointed

name: Pernell Moore
text: Has a pretty good selection of fitted and snapbacks. But if you're looking for something like a Kangol the selection is tiny.

name: Haley Foster
text: Do not know how to answer the phone so had to drive alll the way there for them to tell me they couldn’t make a hat that they told me they could and would be ready by Thursday

name: Clint Williams
text: Friendly experience. Very nice young lady working there. And very helpful

name: Cherry Duke
text: Love the item I bought. But both employees were more into their phone than helping me. I did buy something, but definitely without anyone's help

name: Shane Henry
text: Everything Is Awesome! I had custom hats done, and the staff is 100% professional and really took care of me! 10 out of 10!

name: Ultreya Park
text: Been coming here for Dad for decades to get specific size, specific team traditional ball caps (as opposed to adjustable, or trendy shapes). As with all branded items, it's spendy @ almost $40. Easy Father's Day gift, easy in/out. Bc its mainly just LIDS.

name: gary traywick
text: Staff was very helpful although they didn't have my team it was a great experience

name: Walter Stearman
text: Good place to buy hats.

text:
Awful and so rude... sells dirty hats gross If you know
If you're not black you'll be treated like an idiot. You can't just be a normal guy looking for a hat or they will treat you like a fool

text: Didn't find the hat, I was looking for. But I found a decent hat. I did leave satisfied 👌

name: Now 1 Technologies
text: Ive been by the store three times in the last week. no one is ever in the store!!! The lights stay on with the gate down closed, no one is never in the store!!! I just waited an hour and came back and still no one is in the store. I've came at different times from 12pm to 6pm and no one is never in the store!!!!

name: Eric Nabors
text: Awesome collection of ball caps from mulitple teams and multiple sports even the hard to find ones

name: Zavior Travez
text: Love Lids. Always have what I need and with my card I shop so much I always get discounts. 💚💯

name: Kristie Church
text: Love my new fitted cap and gown got it monogrammed the same day! The sales lady Kiara was very friendly and helpful.

name: Shequonna Campbell
text: Great deals. If you buy 2 hats.

name: Allen Smith
text: Slow Service didn't open until 10:45 and wasn't pleasant at all sometime these urban areas lack good customers service

name: F
text: Always the right sizes

name: Anthony Morris
text: Good service, however some organizations had limited clothing selections and sizes

name: Fredrick Patton
text: Very professional and courteous

name: Felicia Pressley
text: Excellent craftsmanship!!!!

name: Lee Barber
text: Awesome place to get custom printed materials

name: Ramos Kulner
text: The staff is absolutely amazing! I came to customize my sash and they were more than willing to do it, although I lagged big time. Definitely coming back!

name: Billy Coogan
text:
I own a local business and the folks at Visual Effects & Vinyl Solutions are a blessing to have so close to us to do business with.

They do our t-shirts, polos, business cards, vehicle wraps and decals, vinyl banners and we are always happy with the product and ordering processes. A++++

name: Aricka Brazer
text:
Placed a simple order for vinyl stickers with them and they asked me to come back in 2 days. I can buy a product that is five times larger with my manufacturer for the same price This guy was going to charge me for this smaller order.

I came back 3 days later and they couldn't find my order. They called the vinyl person and he didn't answer so she told  me to come back later...not a time. Just later. I left a note with what I was there for and what I needed. Came back 2 hours later and Found out the guy had come back and left again and he did not make them. When the service girl called again he barked he at her to tell me to come back at 4. I don't think so. I left and said don't worry about it.

Bottom line. Wouldn't go back. Wouldn't recommend them. Not good customer service. If he didn't want to do my order he shouldn't have wasted my time.

name: Mike Williams
text: Great job

name: Janie Masterson
text: Best place in town
